languages.text: "Хватит разводить трагедию — один мертвый предатель не стоит таких терзаний".
"Enough vapid tragedy — one dead traitor does not warrant this much handwringing."
languages.original_text: "Хватит разводить трагедию — один мертвый предатель не стоит таких терзаний".

traits.locale_text: "Enough vapid tragedy — one dead traitor does not warrant this much handwringing."
"Enough vapid tragedy — one dead traitor does not warrant this much handwringing."
"Enough vapid tragedy — one dead traitor does not warrant this much handwringing."
"Enough vapid tragedy — one dead traitor does not warrant this much handwringing."
"Enough vapid tragedy — one dead traitor does not warrant this much handwringing."
"Enough vapid tragedy — one dead traitor does not warrant this much handwringing."

languages.text: 「くだらない悲劇ごっこはもう十分だ。裏切り者が一人死んだくらいで、そんなに大騒ぎする価値はない」
languages.original_text: "Enough vapid tragedy — one dead traitor does not warrant this much handwringing."

traits.locale_text: 「くだらない悲劇ごっこはもう十分だ。裏切り者が一人死んだくらいで、そんなに大騒ぎする価値はない」

languages.text: "Genug der geistlosen Tragödie – ein toter Verräter ist so viel Händeringen gar nicht wert."
languages.original_text: "Enough vapid tragedy — one dead traitor does not warrant this much handwringing."

traits.locale_text: "Genug der geistlosen Tragödie – ein toter Verräter ist so viel Händeringen gar nicht wert."

languages.text: « Cessons de parler de tout ça. La mort d'un traître ne mérite pas tant de simagrées. »
languages.original_text: "Enough vapid tragedy — one dead traitor does not warrant this much handwringing."

traits.locale_text: « Cessons de parler de tout ça. La mort d'un traître ne mérite pas tant de simagrées. »

languages.text: «No sea melodramático; la muerte de un traidor no es para tirarse de los pelos».
languages.original_text: "Enough vapid tragedy — one dead traitor does not warrant this much handwringing."

traits.locale_text: «No sea melodramático; la muerte de un traidor no es para tirarse de los pelos».

languages.text: “真是场不值一提的悲剧。不过是死了个叛徒，不值得让你这么心烦意乱。”
languages.original_text: "Enough vapid tragedy — one dead traitor does not warrant this much handwringing."

traits.locale_text: “真是场不值一提的悲剧。不过是死了个叛徒，不值得让你这么心烦意乱。”

languages.text: "Anlamsız yere üzüldüğün yeter. Hainin ölüsü, dirisinden çok kaygıyı hak etmez."
languages.original_text: "Enough vapid tragedy — one dead traitor does not warrant this much handwringing."

traits.locale_text: "Anlamsız yere üzüldüğün yeter. Hainin ölüsü, dirisinden çok kaygıyı hak etmez."
